results.title: Old drug, new tricks: the utility of metformin in infection and vaccination responses to influenza and SARS-CoV-2 in older adults
results.text_hl: Moreover, the ability to repurpose an already FDA approved drug has significant advantages in terms of necessary time and resources. Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has great potential as a therapeutic to improve age-related @<m>DISEASE_614878</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:614878 @@@immune dysregulation@@@ during @DISEASE_Influenza_Human @DISEASE_MESH:D007251 @@@flu@@@ and @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@SARS-CoV-2 infections@@@ and should be further explored to confirm its ability to improve overall immunological resilience in older adults.
